nodes.text: Jetpack Trooper is a single-player online flash player game found on StarWars.com. It is a tie-in to the MMORPG Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures.

The player controls a clone trooper equipped with a jetpack. The objective is to reach the top of the communication tower. Upon doing so, the player is rewarded with a secret code that unlocks a bonus speeder bike for use in Clone Wars Adventures.
